analyzed: om
śrīmat prabhākara guru tantra dhurandhareṇa
mahā mahā upādhyāya śālikanāthamiśreṇa praṇītā prakaraṇa pañcikā
nyāyasiddhi ākhyayā vyākhyayā viṣama sthala ṭipparāyā
ca samalaṅkṛtā
atha naya vīthī
nāma tṛtīyam prakaraṇam
prakaraṇa artha pratijñā
sarvam eva iha vijñānam iti siddhaye
prabhākara guroḥ bhāvaḥ samīcīnaḥ prakāśyate
tatra pūrvapakṣaḥ
tatra tāvat idam kecid ūcire cāru cetasaḥ
bhrama sandeha vijñāne ayathārthe ubhe iti
idam rajatam iti eṣā śuktiśakale matiḥ

original: sā cedyathārthā bhrāntitvaṃ tadā tasyāstu kīdṛśam // 3 //
analyzed: sā ced yathārthā bhrānti tvam tadā tasyāḥ tu kīdṛśam
yathā avasthita vastu ābham api jñānam yadā bhramaḥ
pramāṇeṣu tad āpannā sarva iṣuḥ bhama rūpa tā
viveka agrahaṇam bhrāntiḥ iti ced na etat īdṛśam
suṣupte pi bhrama āpatteḥ sarva bheda aparigrahāt

original: bhūdāgrahe gṛhīte ca yadi syād bhramarūpatā /
analyzed: gṛhīte ca yadi syāt bhrama rūpa tā
dūrāt sāmānya mātrasya darśanam syāt bhramaḥ tadā
yathārtha darśana tve ca na yujyate
ajñāta bheda grahaṇaiḥ na bādhaka matiḥ bhavet
yathārtha tā api ca etasyāḥ katham iti api cintyatām
eṣā hi rajata tvena śuktikām adhyavasyati

original: rajatatvaṃ na śukteśca rajatasya na śuktitā /
analyzed: rajata tvam na śukteḥ ca rajatasya na śukti tā
tayoḥ anyonya bhinna tvam pratyakṣeṇa avadhāritam
athā iyam rajata tvena na śuktim avalambate
sāmānādhikaraṇyena pratipattiḥ virudhyate
rūpya arthinaḥ pravṛttiḥ ca śuktau syāt nirnibandhanā

original: agraho 'pi na bhedasya pravṛttau kāraṇaṃ yataḥ // 11 //
analyzed: agrahaḥ pi na bhedasya pravṛttau kāraṇam yatas
rajata pratipattiḥ ca nā iyam andhasya jāyate
tena iyam indriya adhīnā saṃyukte ca indriyam dhiyam
samartham utpādayitum śukti saṃyogi ca indriyam
tena sā eva indriyeṇa iha rajata tvena gṛhyate  /
syāt matam
tat eva sadṛśa tvena rajata smṛti kāraṇam
sadṛśa pratyayena iha saṃskāra udbodha hetunā
tat iti ullekha rahitā rajate bhavati smṛtiḥ
smṛtau asyām manaḥ doṣāt tat iti aṃśaḥ
tena inrdiya anukāri tvam anyathā asiddham iti asat  /
anubhūte viṣaye tad parāmarśa varjitam
na bodham smṛtim icchanti dhārāvāhika bodha vat
aparokṣa purovarti sāmānādhikaraṇyataḥ
na iyam smṛtiḥ
kintu śuktau bhrāntaḥ yam rajata grahaḥ
smṛti udbodha nimittam ca svapne kiñcid na vidyate
pītaśaṅkha avabodhe ca dvi candra grahaṇe tathā
diś moha alāta cakra ādi bhrāntayaḥ ca katham punar
smṛti tva āśrayaṇena etāḥ varṇanīyāḥ yathārthataḥ
tena indriya ādi doṣeṇa jāyante bhrānti buddhayaḥ
budhyamānāḥ vastu rūpam anyathā sthitam anyathā

original: sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti sandeho yo 'pi jāyate /
analyzed: sthāṇuḥ vā puruṣaḥ vā iti sandehaḥ jāyate
abhāvāt tad dṛśaḥ rthasya sa yathārthaḥ katham bhavet
siddhāntaḥ

original: atra brūmo--ya evārtho yasyāṃ saṃvidi bhāsate /
analyzed: atra brūmaḥ yaḥ eva arthaḥ yasyām saṃvidi bhāsate
vedyaḥ saḥ eva na anyat hi lakṣaṇam  /
idam rajatam iti atra rajatam ca avabhāsate

original: tadeva tena vedyaṃ syānna tu śuktiravedanāt // 24 //
analyzed: tat eva tena vedyam syāt na tu śuktiḥ avedanāt
tena anyasya anyathā bhānam pratītya eva parāhatam

original: parasmin bhāsamāne hi na paraṃ bhāsate yataḥ // 25 //
analyzed: parasmin bhāsamāne hi na param bhāsate yatas
nanu evam rajata ābhāsaḥ katham eṣa
ucyate śuktiśakalam gṛhītam bheda varjitam
śuktikāyāḥ viśeṣāḥ ye rajatāt bheda hetavaḥ

original: te na jñātā abhibhavād jñātā sāmānyarūpatā // 27 //
analyzed: te na jñātāḥ abhibhavāt jñātā sāmānya rūpa tā
anantaram ca rajate smṛtiḥ jātā tathā api ca
manaḥ doṣāt
rajatam viṣayīkṛtya nā eva śukteḥ vivecitam
smṛtyā atas rajata ābhāsaḥ upapannaḥ bhaviṣyati
dhārāvāhika vat nā iyam smṛtiḥ iti uditam ca yat
ucyate smṛtiḥ atra avagamtaye

original: na hyasannihitaṃ tāvat pratyakṣaṃ rajataṃ bhavet /
analyzed: na hi asannihitam tāvat pratyakṣam rajatam bhavet
liṅga ādi abhāvāt ca anyasya pramāṇasya na gocaraḥ
pariśeṣāt smṛtiḥ iti niścayaḥ jāyate tatas
tasyāḥ kāraṇa sadbhāvāt
dhārāvāhika dhīṣu tu
grahaṇa smaraṇe ca ime viveka an avabhāsinī
samyak rajata bodhāt tu bhinne yadi api tattvataḥ
tathā api bhinne na ābhātaḥ bheda agraha sama tvataḥ
samyak rajata bodhaḥ ca samakṣa eka artha gocaraḥ

original: tato bhinne abudhvā tu smaraṇagrahaṇe ime // 35 //
analyzed: tatas bhinne a budhvā tu smaraṇa grahaṇe ime  /
samānena eva rūpeṇa kevalam manyate janaḥ
aparokṣa artha bodhena samāna artha graheṇa ca
a vailakṣaṇya saṃvittiḥ iti tāvat samarthitam
vyavahāraḥ pi tad tulyaḥ tatas eva pravartate
sama tvena ca saṃvitteḥ bhedasya agrahaṇena ca
tad tulya vyavahāra pravartanāt
rajata vyavahāra aṃśe visaṃvādayataḥ narān
bādhaka pratyayasya api bāndhaka tvam atas matam
prasajyamāna rajata vyavahāra nivāraṇāt
sannihita rajata śakale rajata matiḥ bhavati yādṛśī satyā
bheda anadhyavasāyāt iyam api tādṛś parisphurati

original: sādhāraṇaṃ hi rūpaṃ tasyā asyāśca vidyate tena /
analyzed: sādhāraṇam hi rūpam tasyāḥ asyāḥ ca vidyate tena
tanmātra pratibhānāt samāna tām eva manyante
pravṛttiḥ api yujyate ca atas
tad vinivāraṇa karaṇāt bādhaka tā bādhakasya api
evam svapne vastūni smaryamāṇāni santi api
anubhūta aṃśa moṣeṇa bhāsante gṛhyamāṇa vat
grahaṇasya viśeṣaḥ hi gṛhīta grahaṇam smṛtiḥ
sā gṛhīta aṃśa moṣeṇa tiṣṭhati  /
saṃskāra udbodha hetuḥ ca tatra adṛṣṭam prakalpyate
viparīta khyāti pakṣe pi eṣā tulyā hi kalpanā
adṛṣṭasya ca hetu tvāt jāgrataḥ tādṛśī na dhīḥ
avasthā api hi adṛṣṭasya sāmagrī phala sambhave
pītaśaṅkha avabodhe ca pittasya inrdiya vartinaḥ
pītimā gṛhyate upsu iva tigma tā
śaṅkhasya indriya doṣeṇa śuklimā ca na gṛhyate
kevalam dravyamātram tu prathate rūpa varjitam

original: guṇe dravyavyapekṣa45 ca dravye ca guṇakāṅkṣiṇi /
analyzed: guṇe ca dravye ca guṇa kāṅkṣiṇi
bhāsamāne tayoḥ buddhiḥ asambandham na budhyate
satya pīta avabhāsena same bhātaḥ matī ime
vyavahāraḥ pi tad tulyaḥ
evam atra api yujyate  /
yat tu netra gatasya api kajjalasya na kālimā
gṛhyate kāraṇam tatra tena indriya nirodhanam
atasī puṣpa saṃkāśam yat tāvat netra maṇḍalam
tatrastham añjanam yat tat tejaḥ vṛtti nirodhakam
maṇḍala antara saṃsthan tu yat nāma nayane ñjanam
tasya anārjava doṣeṇa nīlimā na avagamyate
indriya upari bhāge pi liptena svaccha bhāvataḥ

original: pittena nāyanaṃ tejaḥ kāceneva na ruddhyate // 55 //
analyzed: pittena na ayanam tejaḥ kācena iva na ruddhyate
prasaran āyanam tejaḥ grāhakam
pittasya agrahaṇam saukṣmyāt prabhāyām iva tejasaḥ
madhure tikta dhīḥ evam vyākhyātā pitta varjinaḥ
taiktyasya rasa hīnasya guḍasya ca parigrahāt
tathā dvi candra bodhe bhinnam dvedhā aindriyam mahaḥ
bhinne janayati prakhye ekasmin eva śītagau

original: samvittī te na bhidyete taddvitve sati manyate /
analyzed: samvittī te na bhidyete tat dvi tve sati manyate
bhinna artha buddhi tulya tvam atra api khalu pūrvavat
smarataḥ pi ekatām tena bhramaḥ yam upapadyate

original: na hi smṛtipramoṣeṇa sarvatraiva bhramo mataḥ // 60 //
analyzed: na hi smṛti pramoṣeṇa sarvatra eva bhramaḥ mataḥ  /
diś mohe dṛṣṭa sāmarthyāt diś sva rūpa anavagrahāt
diś antara sva rūpasya smaraṇāt ca bhramaḥ mataḥ
alāta cakre lātasya bhramataḥ sarvatas
nirantaram dhiyaḥ jātāḥ cakra buddhi samāḥ matāḥ
kāla bhedaḥ tu śīghra tvāt dhiyām tāsām na lakṣyate
cakra dhī vyavahāraḥ ca tena asmin api yujyate
anena eva prakāreṇa sarva bhrāntiṣu paṇḍitaiḥ
ūhanīyāḥ hetu bhedāḥ yathā artha jñāna siddhaye

original: sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti sandehe 'pi yadā dvayam /
analyzed: sthāṇuḥ vā puruṣaḥ vā iti sandehe yadā dvayam
smaryate nyonya nirmuktam tadā artha virahaḥ kutas
yadi ca artham parityajya kācid buddhiḥ pravartate
vyabhicāravatī sva arthe katham viśvāsa kāraṇam
nanu atra api a rajata dhī tulya tā āśaṅkayā samaḥ
aviśvāsaḥ tatra doṣa virahāt ced vinirṇayaḥ
samam etat viparīta khyāti pakṣe dṛśyate
aho bata mahān eṣa pramādaḥ dhīmatām api
jñānasya vyabhicāre hi viśvāsaḥ kiṃnibandhanaḥ

original: jñānasya vyabhicāre 'pi jñātaṃ yat satyameva tat // 69 //
analyzed: jñānasya vyabhicāre jñātam yat satyam eva tat
ajñānam api kintu asti rūpa bheda nibandhanam
jijñāsā jāyate yā iyam sā api anyena nivartate
yatnena anviṣyamāṇe rūpam tat ced na dṛśyate
tadā pūrvā eva ttvena api apadiśyate
ayathārtha tva pakṣe ca jñānam sa ākāram āpatet

original: ākāro bhāsate yo hi jñāna evāvatiṣṭhate // 72 // 51//
analyzed: ākāraḥ bhāsate yaḥ hi jñāne eva avatiṣṭhate
ayathārthasya bodhasya nā utpattau asti kāraṇam
doṣāḥ ced na hi doṣāṇām kārya śakti vighāti tā
bhasmaka ādiṣu kāryasya vighātāt eva doṣa tā
agneḥ hi rasa niṣpattiḥ kāryam jaṭhara vartinaḥ
vidyamāna vastu rūpa grahaṇe pratibandhṛ tā
doṣāṇām upapannā iti
viṣaya avyabhicāri tvam sādhayitum sarva saṃvidām eṣā
niramīyata nīti vidā śālika nāthena naya vīthī
miśraśālika nāthena nayavīthī iti saṃjñitam
kṛtam loka hita arthāya prabhākara matam yathā

original: iti śrīmahāmahopādhyāya-śālikanāthamiśrapraṇītāyāṃ prakaraṇapañcikāyāṃ nītipatho nāma tṛtīyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ samāptam //
analyzed: iti śrī mahā mahā upādhyāya śālikanāthamiśra praṇītāyām prakaraṇa pañcikāyām nītipathaḥ nāma tṛtīyam prakaraṇam samāptam
